member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.FacebookPostInfoProvider.TryCancelScheduledPublishFacebookPost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to cancel scheduled publish of Facebook post. If successful, the post can be modified using . (Has to be called before modification since Facebook does not allow published posts to be modified). There is no need to call this method when deleting a post since posts can be deleted even after publication.
member.param: Identifier of the FacebookPostInfo that shall be canceled.
member.returns: True if successfully canceled, false if the post has already been published.

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.LinkedInInsightsHelper.CollectLinkedInAccountInsights(CMS.SocialMarketing.LinkedInAccountInfo,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Collects LinkedIn statistics for company identified by its LinkedIn identifier. The stats are collected once a day. If is not provided, the system will retrieve statistics for the past 2 days. When is supplied (UTC date), the stats are collected from the day after lastCollectedDateTime till yesterday. Collects both status update stats and follower stats.
member.param: Account for which to process insights.
UTC date (time is not needed) of the last collected stats (accordingly to LinkedIn's time stamps)
member.returns: UTC date of the recently collected stats (accordingly to LinkedIn's time stamps). Null if nothing collected.
member.exception: Thrown when protocol error occurs because the request is not authorized properly.
Thrown when protocol error occurs because the limit of API requests was overdrawn.
Thrown when protocol error occurs.

member.returns: true in case that there any statistics were processed.

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.LinkedInInsightsHelper.GetLinkedInHistoricalFollowerStatistics(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets historical follower statistics for given LinkedIn company profile (only stats for finished days can be retrieved).
member.param: Access token to be used for API querying.
Since when to get the statistics. The endpoint will provide statistics from 12 months before the request date(UTC) till 2 days before the request date(UTC), or later.
member.returns: Historical follower stats for the company profile.
member.exception: Thrown when protocol error occurs because the request is not authorized properly.
Thrown when protocol error occurs because the limit of API requests was overdrawn.
Thrown when protocol error occurs.
When request was not issued correctly.
member.remarks: Can be used to collect statistics for whole days only. This means the latest sinceWhen must represent UTC's date (LinkedIn uses UTC).

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.LinkedInInsightsHelper.GetLinkedInHistoricalStatusUpdateStatistics(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets historical status update statistics for given LinkedIn company profile (only stats for finished days can be retrieved).
member.param: Access token to be used for API querying.
Since when to get the statistics. Should be a UTC date from the past until yesterday. Today's stats can not be retrieved since they are not complete.
member.returns: Historical status update stats for the company profile.
member.exception: Thrown when protocol error occurs because the request is not authorized properly.
Thrown when protocol error occurs because the limit of API requests was overdrawn.
Thrown when protocol error occurs.
When request was not issued correctly.
member.remarks: Can be used to collect statistics for whole days only. This means the latest sinceWhen must represent UTC's yesterday (LinkedIn uses UTC).

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.TwitterPostInfoProvider.TryCancelScheduledPublishTwitterPost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to cancel scheduled publish of Twitter post. If successful, the post can be modified using . (Has to be called before modification since Twitter does not allow published posts to be modified). There is no need to call this method when deleting a post since posts can be deleted even after publication.
member.param: Identifier of the TwitterPostInfo that shall be canceled.
member.returns: True if successfully canceled, false if the post has already been published.

member.returns: True if successfully canceled, false if the post has already been published.

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.URLShortenerHelper.GetDefaultURLShortenerForSocialNetwork(CMS.SocialMarketing.SocialNetworkTypeEnum,CMS.DataEngine.SiteInfoIdentifier)
member.summary: Retrieves the URL shortener for the specified social network posts, and returns it.
member.param: The type of the social network.
Determines which site's settings are used. Provide null to use global settings.
member.returns: The URL shortener for the specified social network posts.
member.remarks: If the URL shortener is not set or the value in the settings is not valid or the social network with the specified name does not exist, a special value URLShortenerTypeEnum.None is returned.

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.URLShortenerHelper.GetAvailableURLShorteners(CMS.DataEngine.SiteInfoIdentifier)
member.summary: Creates a collection of available URL shorteners, and returns it.
member.param: Determines which site's URL shortener settings are used. Provide null to use global settings.
member.returns: A collection of available URL shorteners.
member.remarks: The collection contains URL shorteners that either require no configuration, or where the configuration is present.

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.URLShortenerHelper.IsURLShortenerAvailable(CMS.SocialMarketing.URLShortenerTypeEnum,CMS.DataEngine.SiteInfoIdentifier)
member.summary: Provides information about availability of the URL shortener. If specified shortener is configured for given site, true is returned. False otherwise. If shortener is URLShortenerTypeEnum.None, true is returned as this shortener is always available.
member.param: Shortener whose availability you're interested in.
Determines which site's URL shortener settings are used. Provide null to use global settings.
member.returns: If specified shortener is configured for given site, true is returned. False otherwise. If shortener is URLShortenerTypeEnum.None, true is returned as this shortener is always available.

member.name: M:CMS.SocialMarketing.URLShortenerHelper.ShortenURLsInText(System.String,CMS.SocialMarketing.URLShortenerTypeEnum,CMS.DataEngine.SiteInfoIdentifier)
member.summary: Shortens URLs in given text using selected URL shortener. Throws an exception if shortener is not available for the given site.
member.param: Text in that all URLs will be shortened.
Shortener that will be used for shortening.
Determines which site's URL shortener settings are used. Provide null to use global settings.
member.returns: Text with shortened URLs.
member.exception: Shortener is not available for the given site.
